name: Procjam infinite land generator
description:
Press UP to speed up

Press DOWN to slow down

Infinite terrain generator made for procjam 2020. (Well it might loop at some point) I made a random map generator back in 2016 for procjam, but this new one is procedural! This program works based on a custom perlin noise algrorithm I built for Game Maker: Studio.
The Perlin noise generator algorithm is based on the one from https://adrianb.io/2014/08/09/perlinnoise.html
